text: Microsoft Office 2024 (Fourth perpetual release of Office 17) is a version of the Microsoft Office suite applications for the Microsoft Windows and MacOS. It was released on October 1, 2024. It replaces of Office 2021. Office 2024 remains same major of Office 17 as previous version of Office. Microsoft plans that Office 2024 will ended of support on October 9, 2029. ==Development== In November 14, 2023, Microsoft announced that ready to released of new Microsoft Office version, but it third perpetual release of Office 17 and replaces of Office 2021. Microsoft Office 2024 has release of worldwide on October 1, 2024. ==Related pages== * Microsoft Office 2021 * Microsoft Office 2019 ==References== 2024
title: Microsoft Office 2024
